replies.body: Not just a win for SIN as an organisation, but for the whole of OPL to see how good our top 6 teams can be. I may be a Chiefs fanboy, but SIN has 100% won my respect.

One of the greatest performances in OCE, and possibly even the world. 15 hard fought games in 3 days, overcoming the odds time and time again.

I wear my summoner icon with pride.
{{champion:64}} Carbons performance was fantastic in these games, full respect for the performance made by SIN it was a amazing match to watch.
